class.name: TreeItem
class.brief_description: An internal control for a single item inside [Tree].
class.description: A single item of a [Tree] control. It can contain other [TreeItem]s as children, which allows it to create a hierarchy. It can also contain text and buttons. [TreeItem] is not a [Node], it is internal to the [Tree]. To create a [TreeItem], use [method Tree.create_item] or [method TreeItem.create_child]. To remove a [TreeItem], use [method Object.free]. [b]Note:[/b] The ID values used for buttons are 32-bit, unlike [int] which is always 64-bit. They go from [code]-2147483648[/code] to [code]2147483647[/code].

method.name: add_button
method.description: Adds a button with [Texture2D] [param button] at column [param column]. The [param id] is used to identify the button in the according [signal Tree.button_clicked] signal and can be different from the buttons index. If not specified, the next available index is used, which may be retrieved by calling [method get_button_count] immediately before this method. Optionally, the button can be [param disabled] and have a [param tooltip_text].

method.name: add_child
method.description: Adds a previously unparented [TreeItem] as a direct child of this one. The [param child] item must not be a part of any [Tree] or parented to any [TreeItem]. See also [method remove_child].

method.name: call_recursive
method.description: Calls the [param method] on the actual TreeItem and its children recursively. Pass parameters as a comma separated list.

method.name: clear_custom_bg_color
method.description: Resets the background color for the given column to default.

method.name: clear_custom_color
method.description: Resets the color for the given column to default.

method.name: create_child
method.description: Creates an item and adds it as a child. The new item will be inserted as position [param index] (the default value [code]-1[/code] means the last position), or it will be the last child if [param index] is higher than the child count.

method.name: deselect
method.description: Deselects the given column.

method.name: erase_button
method.description: Removes the button at index [param button_index] in column [param column].

method.name: get_autowrap_mode
method.description: Returns the text autowrap mode in the given [param column]. By default it is [constant TextServer.AUTOWRAP_OFF].

method.name: get_button
method.description: Returns the [Texture2D] of the button at index [param button_index] in column [param column].

method.name: get_button_by_id
method.description: Returns the button index if there is a button with ID [param id] in column [param column], otherwise returns -1.

method.name: get_button_color
method.description: Returns the color of the button with ID [param id] in column [param column]. If the specified button does not exist, returns [constant Color.BLACK].

method.name: get_button_count
method.description: Returns the number of buttons in column [param column].

method.name: get_button_id
method.description: Returns the ID for the button at index [param button_index] in column [param column].

method.name: get_button_tooltip_text
method.description: Returns the tooltip text for the button at index [param button_index] in column [param column].

method.name: get_cell_mode
method.description: Returns the column's cell mode.

method.name: get_child
method.description: Returns a child item by its [param index] (see [method get_child_count]). This method is often used for iterating all children of an item. Negative indices access the children from the last one.

method.name: get_child_count
method.description: Returns the number of child items.

method.name: get_children
method.description: Returns an array of references to the item's children.

method.name: get_custom_bg_color
method.description: Returns the custom background color of column [param column].

method.name: get_custom_color
method.description: Returns the custom color of column [param column].

method.name: get_custom_draw_callback
method.description: Returns the custom callback of column [param column].

method.name: get_custom_font
method.description: Returns custom font used to draw text in the column [param column].

method.name: get_custom_font_size
method.description: Returns custom font size used to draw text in the column [param column].

method.name: get_expand_right
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [code]expand_right[/code] is set.

method.name: get_first_child
method.description: Returns the TreeItem's first child.

method.name: get_icon
method.description: Returns the given column's icon [Texture2D]. Error if no icon is set.

method.name: get_icon_max_width
method.description: Returns the maximum allowed width of the icon in the given [param column].

method.name: get_icon_modulate
method.description: Returns the [Color] modulating the column's icon.

method.name: get_icon_region
method.description: Returns the icon [Texture2D] region as [Rect2].

method.name: get_index
method.description: Returns the node's order in the tree. For example, if called on the first child item the position is [code]0[/code].

method.name: get_language
method.description: Returns item's text language code.

method.name: get_metadata
method.description: Returns the metadata value that was set for the given column using [method set_metadata].

method.name: get_next
method.description: Returns the next sibling TreeItem in the tree or a null object if there is none.

method.name: get_next_in_tree
method.description: Returns the next TreeItem in the tree (in the context of a depth-first search) or a [code]null[/code] object if there is none. If [param wrap] is enabled, the method will wrap around to the first element in the tree when called on the last element, otherwise it returns [code]null[/code].

method.name: get_next_visible
method.description: Returns the next visible TreeItem in the tree (in the context of a depth-first search) or a [code]null[/code] object if there is none. If [param wrap] is enabled, the method will wrap around to the first visible element in the tree when called on the last visible element, otherwise it returns [code]null[/code].

method.name: get_parent
method.description: Returns the parent TreeItem or a null object if there is none.

method.name: get_prev
method.description: Returns the previous sibling TreeItem in the tree or a null object if there is none.

method.name: get_prev_in_tree
method.description: Returns the previous TreeItem in the tree (in the context of a depth-first search) or a [code]null[/code] object if there is none. If [param wrap] is enabled, the method will wrap around to the last element in the tree when called on the first visible element, otherwise it returns [code]null[/code].

method.name: get_prev_visible
method.description: Returns the previous visible sibling TreeItem in the tree (in the context of a depth-first search) or a [code]null[/code] object if there is none. If [param wrap] is enabled, the method will wrap around to the last visible element in the tree when called on the first visible element, otherwise it returns [code]null[/code].

method.name: get_range
method.description: Returns the value of a [constant CELL_MODE_RANGE] column.

method.name: get_range_config
method.description: Returns a dictionary containing the range parameters for a given column. The keys are "min", "max", "step", and "expr".

method.name: get_structured_text_bidi_override
method.description: Returns the BiDi algorithm override set for this cell.

method.name: get_structured_text_bidi_override_options
method.description: Returns the additional BiDi options set for this cell.

method.name: get_suffix
method.description: Gets the suffix string shown after the column value.

method.name: get_text
method.description: Returns the given column's text.

method.name: get_text_alignment
method.description: Returns the given column's text alignment.

method.name: get_text_direction
method.description: Returns item's text base writing direction.

method.name: get_text_overrun_behavior
method.description: Returns the clipping behavior when the text exceeds the item's bounding rectangle in the given [param column]. By default it is [constant TextServer.OVERRUN_TRIM_ELLIPSIS].

method.name: get_tooltip_text
method.description: Returns the given column's tooltip text.

method.name: get_tree
method.description: Returns the [Tree] that owns this TreeItem.

method.name: is_any_collapsed
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [TreeItem], or any of its descendants, is collapsed. If [param only_visible] is [code]true[/code] it ignores non-visible [TreeItem]s.

method.name: is_button_disabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the button at index [param button_index] for the given [param column] is disabled.

method.name: is_checked
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given [param column] is checked.

method.name: is_custom_set_as_button
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the cell was made into a button with [method set_custom_as_button].

method.name: is_edit_multiline
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given [param column] is multiline editable.

method.name: is_editable
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given [param column] is editable.

method.name: is_indeterminate
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given [param column] is indeterminate.

method.name: is_selectable
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given [param column] is selectable.

method.name: is_selected
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given [param column] is selected.

method.name: is_visible_in_tree
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [member visible] is [code]true[/code] and all its ancestors are also visible.

method.name: move_after
method.description: Moves this TreeItem right after the given [param item]. [b]Note:[/b] You can't move to the root or move the root.

method.name: move_before
method.description: Moves this TreeItem right before the given [param item]. [b]Note:[/b] You can't move to the root or move the root.

method.name: propagate_check
method.description: Propagates this item's checked status to its children and parents for the given [param column]. It is possible to process the items affected by this method call by connecting to [signal Tree.check_propagated_to_item]. The order that the items affected will be processed is as follows: the item invoking this method, children of that item, and finally parents of that item. If [param emit_signal] is [code]false[/code], then [signal Tree.check_propagated_to_item] will not be emitted.

method.name: remove_child
method.description: Removes the given child [TreeItem] and all its children from the [Tree]. Note that it doesn't free the item from memory, so it can be reused later (see [method add_child]). To completely remove a [TreeItem] use [method Object.free]. [b]Note:[/b] If you want to move a child from one [Tree] to another, then instead of removing and adding it manually you can use [method move_before] or [method move_after].

method.name: select
method.description: Selects the given [param column].

method.name: set_autowrap_mode
method.description: Sets the autowrap mode in the given [param column]. If set to something other than [constant TextServer.AUTOWRAP_OFF], the text gets wrapped inside the cell's bounding rectangle.

method.name: set_button
method.description: Sets the given column's button [Texture2D] at index [param button_index] to [param button].

method.name: set_button_color
method.description: Sets the given column's button color at index [param button_index] to [param color].

method.name: set_button_disabled
method.description: If [code]true[/code], disables the button at index [param button_index] in the given [param column].

method.name: set_button_tooltip_text
method.description: Sets the tooltip text for the button at index [param button_index] in the given [param column].

method.name: set_cell_mode
method.description: Sets the given column's cell mode to [param mode]. This determines how the cell is displayed and edited. See [enum TreeCellMode] constants for details.

method.name: set_checked
method.description: If [param checked] is [code]true[/code], the given [param column] is checked. Clears column's indeterminate status.

method.name: set_collapsed_recursive
method.description: Collapses or uncollapses this [TreeItem] and all the descendants of this item.

method.name: set_custom_as_button
method.description: Makes a cell with [constant CELL_MODE_CUSTOM] display as a non-flat button with a [StyleBox].

method.name: set_custom_bg_color
method.description: Sets the given column's custom background color and whether to just use it as an outline.

method.name: set_custom_color
method.description: Sets the given column's custom color.

method.name: set_custom_draw
method.description: Sets the given column's custom draw callback to the [param callback] method on [param object]. The method named [param callback] should accept two arguments: the [TreeItem] that is drawn and its position and size as a [Rect2].

method.name: set_custom_draw_callback
method.description: Sets the given column's custom draw callback. Use an empty [Callable] ([code skip-lint]Callable()[/code]) to clear the custom callback. The cell has to be in [constant CELL_MODE_CUSTOM] to use this feature. The [param callback] should accept two arguments: the [TreeItem] that is drawn and its position and size as a [Rect2].

method.name: set_custom_font
method.description: Sets custom font used to draw text in the given [param column].

method.name: set_custom_font_size
method.description: Sets custom font size used to draw text in the given [param column].

method.name: set_edit_multiline
method.description: If [param multiline] is [code]true[/code], the given [param column] is multiline editable. [b]Note:[/b] This option only affects the type of control ([LineEdit] or [TextEdit]) that appears when editing the column. You can set multiline values with [method set_text] even if the column is not multiline editable.

method.name: set_editable
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the given [param column] is editable.

method.name: set_expand_right
method.description: If [param enable] is [code]true[/code], the given [param column] is expanded to the right.

method.name: set_icon
method.description: Sets the given cell's icon [Texture2D]. The cell has to be in [constant CELL_MODE_ICON] mode.

method.name: set_icon_max_width
method.description: Sets the maximum allowed width of the icon in the given [param column]. This limit is applied on top of the default size of the icon and on top of [theme_item Tree.icon_max_width]. The height is adjusted according to the icon's ratio.

method.name: set_icon_modulate
method.description: Modulates the given column's icon with [param modulate].

method.name: set_icon_region
method.description: Sets the given column's icon's texture region.

method.name: set_indeterminate
method.description: If [param indeterminate] is [code]true[/code], the given [param column] is marked indeterminate. [b]Note:[/b] If set [code]true[/code] from [code]false[/code], then column is cleared of checked status.

method.name: set_language
method.description: Sets language code of item's text used for line-breaking and text shaping algorithms, if left empty current locale is used instead.

method.name: set_metadata
method.description: Sets the metadata value for the given column, which can be retrieved later using [method get_metadata]. This can be used, for example, to store a reference to the original data.

method.name: set_range
method.description: Sets the value of a [constant CELL_MODE_RANGE] column.

method.name: set_range_config
method.description: Sets the range of accepted values for a column. The column must be in the [constant CELL_MODE_RANGE] mode. If [param expr] is [code]true[/code], the edit mode slider will use an exponential scale as with [member Range.exp_edit].

method.name: set_selectable
method.description: If [param selectable] is [code]true[/code], the given [param column] is selectable.

method.name: set_structured_text_bidi_override
method.description: Set BiDi algorithm override for the structured text. Has effect for cells that display text.

method.name: set_structured_text_bidi_override_options
method.description: Set additional options for BiDi override. Has effect for cells that display text.

method.name: set_suffix
method.description: Sets a string to be shown after a column's value (for example, a unit abbreviation).

method.name: set_text
method.description: Sets the given column's text value.

method.name: set_text_alignment
method.description: Sets the given column's text alignment. See [enum HorizontalAlignment] for possible values.

method.name: set_text_direction
method.description: Sets item's text base writing direction.

method.name: set_text_overrun_behavior
method.description: Sets the clipping behavior when the text exceeds the item's bounding rectangle in the given [param column].

method.name: set_tooltip_text
method.description: Sets the given column's tooltip text.

method.name: uncollapse_tree
method.description: Uncollapses all [TreeItem]s necessary to reveal this [TreeItem], i.e. all ancestor [TreeItem]s.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], folding is disabled for this TreeItem.
If [code]true[/code], the [TreeItem] is visible (default). Note that if a [TreeItem] is set to not be visible, none of its children will be visible either.

constants.constant: Cell shows a string label. When editable, the text can be edited using a [LineEdit], or a [TextEdit] popup if [method set_edit_multiline] is used.
Cell shows a checkbox, optionally with text. The checkbox can be pressed, released, or indeterminate (via [method set_indeterminate]). The checkbox can't be clicked unless the cell is editable.

Cell shows a numeric range. When editable, it can be edited using a range slider. Use [method set_range] to set the value and [method set_range_config] to configure the range. This cell can also be used in a text dropdown mode when you assign a text with [method set_text]. Separate options with a comma, e.g. [code]"Option1,Option2,Option3"[/code].
Cell shows an icon. It can't be edited nor display text.

Cell shows as a clickable button. It will display an arrow similar to [OptionButton], but doesn't feature a dropdown (for that you can use [constant CELL_MODE_RANGE]). Clicking the button emits the [signal Tree.item_edited] signal. The button is flat by default, you can use [method set_custom_as_button] to display it with a [StyleBox]. This mode also supports custom drawing using [method set_custom_draw_callback].
